title: Fireman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Hunt. You attack them tomorrow night and clean them, salvaging their body. (You cannot act on nights you are attacking, you can also choose to cancel the attack.)
- During the day, you may shovel one body into the train's firebox, fueling the train tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can see how many bodies you have stored at all times.
- You gain additional powers depending on how long the train's been fueled in a row.

fields.name: Train Upgrades (Only if the train has been fueled for this many days in a row. If the train is not fueled for a night, reset to 0):
fields.value:
One Night: You can Hunt on nights that you make attacks.
Two Nights: You are forced to make an additional attack each night. This attack does not clean and does not salvage the body. Your name is revealed to one visitor of that player.
Three Nights: You appear innocent and are roleblock and control immune. Your name is no longer revealed to visitors of the player of your additional attack.
Four Nights: You escape the town, leaving the game in victory. The town is given flavor text on your train leaving.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4277
*The fireman wiped the sweat off his brow as he shoveled fuel into the train's firebox. What he had to use as fuel in this circumstances was less than ideal - smelly, disgusting, and bloody bits of body - but it didn't matter. The train must keep running, and the schedule must be met.*
